name: calcium
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Increases Special Attack effort by 10, but won’t increase it beyond 100. Increases happiness by 5/3/2.
short_effect: Raises Special Attack effort and happiness.

flavor_text.sword_shield: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. When consumed, it raises the Sp. Atk base points of a single Pokémon.
